core:process.core:name: Process Gift Cards
core:process.core:comment: Processes any (non-voided) gift card sale or tender items which have not already been processed online.

core:assignAction.core:comment: Set properties for new gift card, including expiry date if applicable.

core:executeProcessAction.core:comment: Update the gift card status and balance and create a history record

core:assignAction.core:comment: Calculate new gift card expiry date from transaction date and expiry period values.

core:state.core:comment: Load account balance for existign gift card. May be required for update of status.
